Generation VI.X: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
Generation VI.Y: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

Generation VII.Sun: This even-tempered Pokémon has a habit of collecting keys. It will sneak into people's homes to steal their keys.
Generation VII.Moon: It inserts its horn into chinks in metal, absorbing metal ions. For some reason, it collects keys.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Although it's unclear why it collects keys, giving it a key makes Klefki very happy. However, it apparently only likes master keys.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Long ago it lived in mines, but once the minerals that make up its diet became scarcer, Klefki began appearing in human settlements.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon is constantly collecting keys. Entrust a Klefki with important keys, and the Pokémon will protect them no matter what.
Generation VIII.Shield: Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so much that its head needed to look like one, too.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Once it absorbs a key’s metal ions, it discards the key without a second thought. However, it will hang on to keys it favors for decades.
Generation IX.Violet: In the past, noble families entrusted their vault keys to a Klefki. They passed the Klefki down through the generations, taking good care of it.

Generation VI.X: Routes 15 and 16 , Lost Hotel , Friend Safari ( Steel )
Generation VI.Y: Routes 15 and 16 , Lost Hotel , Friend Safari ( Steel )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Fields of Honor Fields of Honor ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Six North Province: Glaseado Mountain
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Six North Province: Glaseado Mountain
